thread.title: Erik

author: Erik
title: Erik
text:
Being in Canada we were hesitant to purchase a luxury item via internet and phone. However the service was excellent by Adam and the entire team backing him up. Delivery was amazingly fast and smooth and most importantly--the Cartier watch was exactly as represented--and perhaps in even better condition than described--it was brand new in every way.
The warranty gives great reassurance. We look forward to seeing their bricks and mortar next time we travel to London.
We will definitely buy here again when the occasion arises.
